This week's Hug Day will focus on '''ubiquity'''! 

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your '''Launchpad Id''' in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged. 

=== Design specification ===

Are you unsure what’s the expected behavior with a particular bug? The <nowiki>[[http://goo.gl/Kokw5|design specification]]</nowiki> may have the answer. 

=== Other questions? ===
Check the <nowiki>[[Ubiquity|ubiquity]]</nowiki> wiki page for more information on debugging, testing, and screenshots of the installer.

=== Stock Responses ===

For problem specific Stock Responses see: <nowiki>[[Bugs-Responses]]</nowiki>
